评论详情: It reminds me of a coat I had 15-20 years ago,  so I snapped it up on sale. It isn't really my everyday vibe anymore, but it would be great for getting dressed up. It arrived in great condition and the faux fur feels really soft and luxurious.

评论概述: Luxurious Fur bomber jacket with hood
评论详情: I like the romance of a fur bomber jacket. Fur plus bomber style equals casual luxury. I can pair this jacket with many different styles. The jacket is better in person, and very cozy.
